title: GMCH Chhatrapati Sambhajinagar Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 05 Staff Nurse Posts
description: The Government Medical College Hospital Chhatrapati Sambhajinagar (GMCH Chhatrapati Sambhajinagar) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 05 Blood Bank Counsellor, Lab Technician, and Staff Nurse Jobs. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last dates of application. Candidates who have completed their Post-graduation, DMLT, B.Sc Nursing, GNM, and 12th  can apply for the GMCH Chhatrapati Sambhajinagar Recruitm...
